name: Anal Fissure
chief_complaint: Pain during bowel movements and bright red blood on toilet paper
symptoms: Bright red blood on stool or toilet paper
Itching or irritation around the anus
physical_findings: Visible tear in the anal mucosa
prognosis: Excellent with proper treatment, most heal within 4-6 weeks
description: A small tear in the thin, moist tissue (mucosa) lining the anus. Often caused by passing large or hard stools, chronic diarrhea, or childbirth.
